oai_dc:dc.dc:title: William E. Kofs carte-de-visite
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Carte-de-visite portrait of William E. Kofs. Possibly the William Kofs who served in both Co. C and Co. I, 3rd Regiment, US Infantry (Regular Army). The 3rd participated in several major battles during the Civil War including First and Second Manassas, Antietam, Chancellorsville, and Gettysburg. The soldier appears to be wearing a private purchase sack coat with military buttons and a military style vest.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Kofs, William E.
